name: Bad London
description:
Now, all we have left is our home and the thirst for revenge. We are siblings and like siblings we will unite and stand together to regain what is rightfully ours.

We don't want to murder them, that would be too little; we want to disfigure them and never let them rise up from the mud they came from.

 We were the Wolves of Wharf Street… And we still are!

 FEATURES: 

  • Quick paced strategic gameplay
  • Manage and modify the battlefield to gain an advantage position
  • 3 game modes: defense, dominion, escort
  • 5 classes, each with a unique set of skills
  • Choose wisely your battles and shape your own story
  • Victorian fashioned setting

 CONTROLS:

  • Left Mouse Drag/WASD: Move camera
  • Right Mouse Drag/QE: Rotate Camera
  • Left Click: Select/Use skill
  • Right Click: Move
  • Alt: Enable Skill
  • Space: Tactical Pause
